name: Custom Hair Falls
description:
Winning bid will receive a BRAND NEW
Pair of Loose Hair falls
with base colour BLACK

(I can do other 'normal' shades for the base
if you don't want black - please ask first)

Materials: All synthetic!
Silky Soft Japanese Fibre  Falls
(glam fluffy falls of great quaility,
does not matt up like other fibres, fully brushable) 
with silky accents

Length: Long (lower back, see pics)

 Style: Poofy Goth Lox!
Glamerous & beautifully hand layered at the ends

Accent colours

(I also have pale blonde, mid purple and emerald green at the moment)

YOU get to pick the colour of the accents, any combination you like.
I can do it chunky or blended,
no limit to the colours and no change in the price! 

 Each set of falls will be mounted securely along elastic ribbon,
for great coverage! Just ties onto a bun of your own hair
(illustrated instructions included)

PAYMENT - PAYPAL ONLY, please do not bid unless you will pay by PAYPAL 
I ALWAYS follow up non paying bidders!

Each set is custom made and so will take me at least a week to make,
depending on what I have in stock at the time.  Please just ask.

I always keep people informed of progress



 

More pics of my work can be found here
http://darkling-hair.livejournal.com/


I don't have to make fantastical claims about the falls I make,
my customer feedback says it all.  I have been making falls in my own unique way for years.
